title: Orfeas Peridis - Ah Psihi Mou Fantasmeni (Greek Music)@320
description:
Orfeas Peridis was born 20th February 1957 in Athens. He is a singer and songwriter. He studied classical music in various conservatoires and took degree of Harmony and classic guitar. Before his becoming well known in the Greek public, he used to sing with his guitar in various places. It was then in 1993, when he released his first album &#039;Ah, Psihi mou fantasmeni&#039;, which includes tracks like &#039;Fotovolida&#039;, &#039;Zilevi i nihta&#039;, &#039;Fevgo&#039;and &#039;Roben ton kammenon dason&#039;.
